answers.answer: Hahahaha I'm in the same boat, due on the 18th with a Lil girl FTM. I forget I'm pregnant too cause damn we been pregnant for so long it just feels natural now. I mean it is uncomfortable but I'm use to it now and I feel like I forgotten what its like NOT to be pregnant. My baby's head is engaged also but I know I will go past my due date probably have to be induced cause nothing is happening! Oh well all in God's hands:)

Due the 19th and might get induced Tuesday due to high blood pressure. But if I don't Idk when my baby's going to come I haven't lost my mucous plug he still hasn't dropped haven't had any contractions just light cramps. I forget I'm pg too lol
Glad to know there are people in the same situation. Two more days to go till due date and still no signs. :( I'm actually really scared of getting induced.

Im in the same boat.Due the 19th and I can see that I will be going past that date as well. I have another appt on Wednesday,so I can't wait to see what this week's update is since not much changed from 2 weeks before til last week.

I also have an appointment on Wednesday. If baby is not here by then, doctor will schedule for an induction. Kinda dreading for another VE. Had one last week and it was painful and uncomfortable. :( Plus my doctor said she won't allow her patients to go past 5 days after their due dates. Kinda good to know at least by this weekend I will have my little baby in my arms.
One more day to go before my due date! Just received news of my cousin, whose due date is a week later than mine, just gave birth. I'm having major birth envy right now. Lol.

question: 3 days to go till I'm 40 weeks! I had my check up last week and doctor said baby's head is already engaged. According to her gut, the baby would probably arrive before my due date, but my gut says otherwise. I haven't lost my mucus plug, my contractions aren't that bad (felt more like tightening of the stomach). Just that i sometimes feel really sore at my pelvis when i wake up and i sometimes go on an emotional rollercoaster. I'm almost 40 weeks and I sometimes forget that I'm even pregnant. Lol. Doctor said she'll only induce me after my due date since I don't have either gestational diabetes nor high blood pressure. Can't wait to meet my little son. Hope he'd come out soon.
title: Due on 18th Feb.
